  3. Mullach nan Coirean

Mullach nan Coirean

Hear pronunciation Press to hear pronunciation

Mullach nan Coirean is the westernmost of the Mamores. It is a fine grassy ridge but lacks the distinctive pointed summit of many of the other peaks in the range.

 You have not climbed Mullach nan Coirean.

Region: Fort William

Altitude: 939 metres

Users' Rating:
  • Currently 3.37/5
Rating: 3.4/5 (79 votes cast)

You must be registered and signed-in to vote

Detailed route description and map

Stob Ban and Mullach nan Coirean from Polldubh, Glen Nevis

Other routes and challenges

The route given above can be varied by ascending Stob Ban via its north ridge and Sron Dearg; the ridge above is narrow and has some brief scrambling.

The classic epic challenge for the hyper-fit is to traverse the whole Mamores ridge in a day - a major undertaking.

Walker-friendly accommodation in the area

Fort William Hotels

Fort William B&B

Fort William Cottages

Lochaber Hostels

Panoramic summit view (click to open)
